Author: SQUAREX
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] SQUAREX - Decentralized Real Estate Ecosystem
Body: SQUAREX Weekly Update #3  Good news everyone! For those who are unfamiliar with Sqaurex Ecosystem, let us tell you that we publish a Sqaurex Platform Update every single week on our Medium page. Here comes our 3rd update on the events of last week. As we previously said in our posts, last we week our team leaders Kirill Kotilevskii, Igor Vasilev and Maxim Levoshin went to Korea to take part in Global Complex Smart City and Blockchain Forums. Now let us share some more details with you.

Author: SQUAREX
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] SQUAREX - Decentralized Real Estate Ecosystem
Body: SQUAREX DECENTRALIZED REAL ESTATE CROWDBUILDING AND SQUARE EXCHANGE ECOSYSTEM Website | Telegram | Blog | LinkedIn | Facebook | Twitter  WHITE PAPER  MISSION Our Company’s mission is to develop a platform which will enable buyers and backers purchase safe and liquid real estate at the beginning of construction without real estate developer and agency added costs. The platform will provide control over the funding of construction process via oracles at decentralized crowd-building program, which is balanced, operates based on smart-contracts and belong to the community.  THE PROBLEM WE SOLVE In many countries up to 80% of construction market is controlled by large development companies. Such corporations build in an outdated paradigm of low quality and high price realty. Due to a lack of transparency in construction process, quality of realty often does not meet one declared in the project.  PRICE OF A SQUARE METER NOW CONSISTS OF: -loans, that construction company pays to banks; -excess construction costs caused by fictitious counterparts, for example excess intermediaries in a supply chain of construction materials; -delacosts, that can account for up to 30% and in some cases up to 70% of construction cost; -real estate developer and agency profit; -actual cost price of construction.  XXth century lifestyle: up to 80% of world population rent housing or own apartments in economy-class buildings with unattractive architecture while expensive elite realty of high quality and beauty is affordable to very few.  AN OPPORTUNITY WE CREATE Fair construction: a decentralized ecosystem for real estate development based on blockchain and smart-contracts that is owned by the community. Buying real estate at a very early stage during Initial Square Offering: no delay cost, developer’s profit or loans that corporations pay to banks are included in the price. Quality matches with one declared in the project, as a consequence of transparent supply chain. High liquidity of square meters of premises as a result of tokenization and high demand. Security of transactions for buyers and backers.  PRICE OF A SQUARE METER IN SQUAREX ECOSYSTEM: -auditors/curators (community fee); -margin of land owners and architects; -actual cost price of construction.  XXIst century lifestyle: high quality real estate affordable for everyone. Modern architecture in harmony with environment as a natural choice of community. Beauty and prosperity in the world architecture as chosen by the community.  WHO WILL BENEFIT FROM SQUAREX ECOSYSTEM? - Buyers who will be able to acquire real estate up to 70% cheaper cost per square meter - Construction Contractors who will gain access to the  smart-contract database of construction works and the reliability of construction processes - Real estate Creditors and Backers with up to 70% more advantageous acquisition compared to traditional crowdfunding mechanisms - Traditional Developers and Land Owners with significant time and cost savings  HOW DOES IT WORK? The platform is based on decentralized initial square offering and decentralized real estate development process. SQUAREX will provide control over the funding of construction process via oracles at decentralized crowd-building program, which is supported by smart contracts and belong to the community. We offer you a crowdbuilding platform with reliable mechanisms of initial square offering – ISO.  HOW IS SQUAREX BETTER THAN OTHER SOLUTIONS? SQUAREX uses all the emerging opportunities of smart contracts to deliver flexible and transparent interaction options in real estate development. The SQEX token is the useful and flexible part of a decentralized network enabling transparent, cross-border settlement mechanism for all buyers and backers. The platform will enable buyers to save up to 70% of money they need to buy house or flat. And it will help to control funding of construction process directly via blockchain and smart contracts by ISO.  LAUNCHING PROCESS Meet SQUAREX 1.0: we are proud to say that first release of SQAUREX Ecosystem is ready to perform. Next release is coming!   TEAM Kirill Kotilevskiy – Founder, CEO Experienced private and public equity professional with focus on securitisation of real estate and real estate development.   Igor Vasilyev – Founder, CTO 12 years of IT-industry experience. Since 2011 Igor has successfully created and launched more than 10 IT solutions in online retail and for other IT projects.   Vitaliy Sorokin - Backend/Blockchain developer 10 years in IT development, participated in lots of blockchain and cryptocurrency related projects   Daniil Aleksandrov - Fullstack developer More than 10 years software development for workflow automation and stock-exchange processing.   Roman Nesterov - Devops engineer More than 12 years software development experience. And 5 years of highload fail safe systems development experience.   Timur Evgazhukov - Backend/Blockchain developer 16+ years of IT development. 7+ years FinTech experience. Most of Timur’s experience was in the development of highload web services for major banks (VTB24, Alfa-Bank and others) and government structures.  Learn more about SQUAREX on our website or contact us via email, and join our social media channels: Website | Telegram | Blog | LinkedIn | Facebook | Twitter

Author: SQUAREX
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] SQUAREX - Decentralized Real Estate Ecosystem
Body: Hi! Thanks a lot for your interest in SQUAREX This is an international thread, so we kindly ask you to communicate in English. For Russian speaking community, please, visit our Telegram chat: https://t.me/squarex_rus. We'll be glad to have you there!  Yes, we plan a bounty campaign, also our pre-ICO starts in August and the beginning of our ICO is planned for November.

Author: SQUAREX
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] SQUAREX - Decentralized Real Estate Ecosystem
Body: Thank you for you support, we really appreciate that. We would also like to kindly ask you though, to communicate here in English only, due to the fact that this is an international thread  Please, join our Russian speaking Telegram community  https://t.me/squarex_rus. We would be glad to answer your questions related to the project.  As far as I understand, you asked if it is possible to buy only a few tokened metres using Squarex Ecosystem and then hold them so no one could buy the whole apartment later. In short, no.  In more details, it happens like this:  1. The user selects a favorite object (apartment) in the building and tows it; this freezes the number of tokens less (if there are not enough tokens), or equal to the number of tokens in the apartment (set in advance). One object can attract a lot of users, therefore, there is overbooking on the platform. 2. After some period of time, the sale of apartments on the platform takes place (the status of the project on the platform - “available for sale”). For booked objects, platform is offering to buy back the objects for the users who have put the largest number of tokens into them. 3. The user who contributed the most tokens for the object is given a few days to conclude a contract with the developer; if during this time he enters into a contract - the user's tokens are burned, and the rest of the participants are returned the booked tokens. 4. If during the allotted time the user does not enter into a contract, then he/she returns tokens (minus the fee for hold (similar to the fine)), and the platform offers the next on the list to buy an apartment. 5. The user who booked the object, but was not the first in the queue, can exit the booking without paying a fee (but no more than a few times-after which the platform does not allow you to remove the booking) 6. User who has the tokens can at any moment stand in the queue to book in advance, starting with the status “Available for booking” to the status “Sale”. 7. When the project enters the “sale completed " state, the tokens of the buyers that have not been used are burned, and the amount of invested funds + the bonus in SQEX tokens is returned to them.

Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] SQUAREX - Decentralized Real Estate Ecosystem
Body: Hello! Thanks for asking, this kind of question is actually what we expect from anyone into the real estate to be interested at. We assume that it will be more than enough. Our business model is based on a deep market analysis. The overall volume of the construction market for 2019 is expected to be at 1.3 trillion USD point, as estimated by experts.  Note to mention some the US crowdsplatform which attracted more than 1 billion USD investment in construction business over the past year, we are more than sure that the blockchain and smart contracts technology and transparency of SQUAREX platform are the key things which can make even greater outcome.

Author: SQUAREX
Title: [ANN][Pre-ICO] SQUAREX - Decentralized Real Estate Ecosystem
Body: Hello! We are partly agree, real estate market definitely is experiencing some problems right now, due to the  lack of transparency in construction process. However, blockchain provides a solution transparency problems, and this is what Squarex platform is all about - to let buyers and backers control and purchase safe and liquid real estate at the beginning of construction without real estate developer and agency added costs.
